cli Usage

  1. Import it: 
    @font-face {
  font-family:picon;
  src:url(//yne.fr/picon/picon.woff2);
}
  2. Declare it: 
    rb {
  font-family:picon;
}
  3. Use it : 
    <rb>app</rb>
    to get the app app icon
